channel.title: Dimitris Glezos' old personal site - Fedora

item.title: OpenOffice and Latex equation syntax
item.description: On Fedora: sudo yum -y install openoffice.org-ooolatex. Plain. Effectiveness.
item.dc:creator: Dimitris Glezos

item.title: Fedora Weekly Webcomic EOL’ed
item.description: Oh dear. The awesome Fedora Webcomic is being EOL’ed. I’ll miss the Greek Ubuntu team complaining to me: “Aren’t there any other distros to make fun of?” =)
item.dc:creator: Dimitris Glezos

item.title: Notes from Amsterdam
item.description:
(cc) by liber

  • Feeling like the guy with the best host’s house in the world.
  • Went for a walk at the local Saturday market. We bought a few stuff to cook some nice dishes during the week.
  • On Saturday afternoon the city felt more like Edinburgh than Amsterdam. The …
item.dc:creator: Dimitris Glezos

item.title: Amsterdam, baby!
item.description: I have been looking forward to this trip for quite a while. My travel has been reduced lately, as I’m preoccupied with all the great stuff happening at the Indiplex. Long hours of hacking and designing, planning and talking with clients — not much time to think and interrupt the …
item.dc:creator: Dimitris Glezos

item.title: Fedora L10n Project Advancement Study
item.description:
“There are three kinds of lies: lies, damned lies, and statistics.”

Mark Twain, originally by Benjamin Disraeli

Seeing some nifty statistics from the Fedora Ambassadors group, I decided to jot down some statistics for the Localization group too. Once in a while, it helps taking a step back, and be …
item.dc:creator: Dimitris Glezos

item.title: Fedora Board decisions in the open
item.description: I’m so glad folks on the Fedora Board are insisting on taking discussions that could be discussed in the open to our public advisory board list.
item.dc:creator: Dimitris Glezos

item.title: A seat on the Fedora Board
item.description:
Either due to ignorance or simply blunt encouragement for my evil plans for World Domination ™ (wicked music played in the background), I was appointed by Red Hat to take a seat on the Fedora Board.

I’ll start off by saying a big ‘Thank you’ to all who supported my …
item.dc:creator: Dimitris Glezos

item.title: Results of Fedora Board Elections
item.description: Came out 3rd on the recent Elections for the Fedora Board. I’m extremely happy with the result, as Bill and Matt are two fantastic guys who have tons to offer. I’m also humbled from the number of votes I received — I’ll take it as a sign to …
item.dc:creator: Dimitris Glezos

item.title: Υποψηφιότητα Αθήνας για Ευρω-FUDCon 2009
item.description: Μόλις ανέβασα μερικές πληροφορίες για την υποψηφιότητα της Αθήνας για το FUDCon EMEA 2009.
item.dc:creator: Dimitris Glezos

item.title: Fedora Board voting live
item.description: A few days now we’ve got the Fedora Board Elections live. Check out the awesome group of candidates we have and cast your vote.
item.dc:creator: Dimitris Glezos
